title: How to Dress for the Boho DTI Prompt: Roblox Tutorial

steps.title: Boho fashion is all about freedom of expression and individuality.
steps.content: Boho fashion is all about freedom of expression and individuality. The fashion style typically involves loose, flowing clothing in earth tones, lots of accessories, and flowers. [1] X Research source Headscarves, long skirts, tassels, and bell sleeves are just a few traits of boho fashion . This style originated in the 19th century and has been evolving ever since. Boho fashion can sometimes look somewhat hippie-like, but if you maintain a more muted earth-tone palette with just a few splashes of color, you'll look more boho instead of retro. Boho fashion draws from influences from the bohemianism movement of the 19th century. This subculture was/is focused on living a life outside of what society deems conventional. Boho chic fashion also draws from the traditional clothing styles of nomadic Roma people. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Tops
steps.content: Tops The best tops for a "Boho" theme: The cropped V-neck top with long bell sleeves by the seasonal attire is the perfect loose boho top for your DTI look. The button-up Hawaiian shirt next to the men's clothing is a good loose top (as long as you change the pattern, of course!) The flowy bikini top across from the accessories is a good flowy boho top.

steps.title: Bottoms
steps.content: Bottoms The best bottoms for a "Boho" theme: The long white dress by the male/female body picker can be turned into a great maxi skirt. The flared jeans across from the accessories are a good choice if you're going for a more casual boho look.

steps.title: Dresses
steps.content: Dresses The best dress for a "Boho" theme is the long white dress by the male/female body picker. You can also change the dress into a skirt if you'd prefer to wear a different top.

steps.title: Shoes
steps.content: Shoes The best shoes for a "Boho" theme are the sandals across from the seasonal attire. These shoes will make a great addition to a boho outfit.

steps.title: Accessories
steps.content: Accessories The best accessories for a "Boho" theme: The rose flower crown next to the men's clothing section is a great way to add something natural to your outfit, which is a big part of boho fashion. The hip chain across from the accessories is a fun addition to a boho outfit. The long skinny scarf in the accessories section is a good addition to your boho outfit, especially if you give it a knitted pattern look. The green messenger bag in the accessories section is a good choice if you want to add a purse to your outfit.

steps.title: Hair
steps.content: Hair The best hair choices for a "Boho" theme: Braids. Long braids are a great boho look, especially if you're going for something sweet or innocent. Something wispy. Something wispy and dreamy-looking would fit great with a boho look, as it makes you look a little tousled and natural.

steps.title: Makeup
steps.content: Makeup The best makeup for a "Boho" theme is anything natural. Boho style is all about earthy tones and going with the flow. However, boho style is also about expressing your individuality, so pick something that expresses the look you're going for with your outfit.

steps.title: Nails
steps.content: Nails The best nails for a "Boho" theme are short and natural-colored. However, if you have a pop of color in your outfit, it would look great to match your nail color to that color.

steps.title: Seasonal and VIP
steps.content: Seasonal and VIP Don't forget to check out the seasonal cosmetics with the various seasonal updates, as well as the VIP room if you have access to it!
